statements: SELECT * FROM team_communication_logs
SELECT log_id, log_type, message FROM team_communication_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT message FROM team_communication_logs WHERE log_type = 'error' ORDER BY log_id ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM team_communication_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT DISTINCT log_type FROM team_communication_logs
SELECT * FROM team_communication_logs ORDER BY log_id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT log_type, message FROM team_communication_logs WHERE log_id BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT message, timestamp FROM team_communication_logs WHERE log_type = 'Email' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT log_id, message, timestamp FROM team_communication_logs WHERE log_type = 'Meeting' ORDER BY log_id ASC
SELECT * FROM team_communication_logs WHERE log_type IN ('Call', 'Chat') ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM chat_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, user_id, message FROM chat_logs WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM email_exchanges WHERE subject LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT sender_email, recipient_email, body FROM email_exchanges ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT id, sender_email, recipient_email, subject FROM email_exchanges WHERE sender_email = 'admin@example.com';
SELECT * FROM chat_logs WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT message, timestamp FROM chat_logs WHERE user_id = 2 AND timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT id, user_id, message FROM chat_logs WHERE id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM email_exchanges WHERE sender_email LIKE '%@gmail.com' AND recipient_email NOT LIKE '%@yahoo.com' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 20
SELECT id, sender_email, recipient_email, subject FROM email_exchanges WHERE subject LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM chat_logs WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT message_id, message_text, timestamp FROM chat_logs WHERE receiver_id = 2;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message_text FROM chat_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM email_exchanges WHERE sender_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT member_name, role FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM chat_logs WHERE sender_id = 1 AND receiver_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message_text FROM chat_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id, timestamp FROM chat_logs WHERE sender_id = 3 OR receiver_id = 4 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM email_exchanges WHERE sender_email LIKE 'john%' OR receiver_email LIKE 'mary%' ORDER BY email_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_messages, sender_email, receiver_email FROM email_exchanges GROUP BY sender_email, receiver_email;
SELECT * FROM chat_logs ORDER BY log_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT message, sender_name FROM chat_logs WHERE sender_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM email_exchanges WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sender_email, receiver_email FROM email_exchanges WHERE subject LIKE '%important%' AND content LIKE '%urgent%';
SELECT member_name, role FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM chat_logs WHERE sender_name = 'Alice';
SELECT message, sender_name, timestamp FROM chat_logs WHERE receiver_name = 'Bob' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_name, COUNT(log_id) AS message_count FROM chat_logs GROUP BY sender_name ORDER BY message_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM email_exchanges WHERE content LIKE '%urgent%' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT team_members.member_name, team_stats.total_messages FROM team_members JOIN team_stats ON team_members.member_id = team_stats.stat_id WHERE team_members.role = 'Developer';
SELECT * FROM chat_logs;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message FROM chat_logs WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM email_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT sender_id, body FROM email_logs WHERE receiver_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT name, email, role FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM chat_logs WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT id, sender_id, receiver_id, timestamp FROM email_logs WHERE subject LIKE '%important%';
SELECT message, timestamp FROM chat_logs WHERE receiver_id = 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT name, email, role FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Admin' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT role_name, permission_level FROM team_roles TR JOIN permissions P ON TR.id = P.role_id WHERE TR.permission_level > 3;
